message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is worth $15,000 to you, and my asking price reflects its true worth and the exclusivity it offers. I kindly propose to sell the product to you for $12,000. This offer allows you to secure a piece of high-quality merchandise at a premium yet reasonable price, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.
